title: All possible configuration options that can be provided when starting the sensor

key_matcher.title: The sensor is triggered when an object key matches the regex from this config option

trigger_on_existing_file.title: When enabled, the sensor will check for the existence of a file before listening for updates to the bucket. Only works when key_matcher.type = exact

existing_file_max_age_minutes.title: If trigger_on_existing_file is set, the existing file must have been created on or after the current time minus the max_age period which is specified in minutes
